title: Transfer Learning-Based Deep Learning Fundamentals for Tamil Handwritten Character Recognition

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Students are social science majors with foundational AI knowledge, with the primary goal of learning how to apply transfer learning using real datasets.

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 90% accuracy in Tamil handwritten character recognition using a transfer learning model based on Inception-v3.
Learners can preprocess the HP Tamil dataset and optimize it for classification problems.
Learners can improve learning efficiency through hyperparameter tuning when applying transfer learning.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
